QuestData.Title: Your Problem Now
QuestData.Description:
Hm. This egg does not belong to one of my brood, and I have no broodlings that need another sibling.
<Pa'ku might be smiling or snarling. She is showing an awful lot of teeth.>
You will care for this little one. And you had better hurry.
It will hatch very soon.
Oh, and a little advice. If you want the little one to like you, you had better be the first thing it sees upon hatching.
QuestData.LogDescription: Place the Pterrordax Egg at the empty nest and wait for it to hatch.

Objectives.Objective: Egg placed in a suitable nest
